Category.Name: Root
Category.ToolTip: Entry for traversing the node graph.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: CoaXPress
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the features pertaining to the CoaXPress transport layer of the device.
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the CoaXPress transport layer of the device.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceClockSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Device Clock
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Device Clock

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: RegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Region.
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Region.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flips horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flips horizontally the image sent by the device.

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flips vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flips vertically the image sent by the device.

Boolean.Name: ComponentEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the selected component streaming is active.

Integer.Name: ComponentIDValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by Component Selector.
Integer.Description: Returns a unique Identifier value that corresponds to type of the component selected by Component Selector.

Enumeration.Name: ComponentSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a component to activate/deactivate its data streaming.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image (valid bits). This value is always coherent with the PixelFormat feature.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image (valid bits). This value is always coherent with the PixelFormat feature.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image. This value is always coherent with the PixelFormat feature.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image. This value is always coherent with the PixelFormat feature.

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

Enumeration.Name: ImageSensorBitSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Image Sensor Bit Size.
Enumeration.Description: Image Sensor Bit Size.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Trigger
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Trigger

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.

Float.Name: MaximumAcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Shows the Maximum acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Shows the Maximum acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Integer.Name: MinimumExposureTime
Integer.ToolTip: Shows the Minimum ExposureTime (in us) at TriggerMode is Off.
Integer.Description: Shows the Minimum ExposureTime (in us) at TriggerMode is Off.

Integer.Name: HorizontalPeriodExtend
Integer.ToolTip: Control the streaming throughput delay by extending the horizontal period.
Integer.Description: Control the streaming throughput delay by extending the horizontal period.

Integer.Name: Hmax
Integer.ToolTip: HMAX
Integer.Description: HMAX

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Gain
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Gain

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Black Level
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Black Level

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Balance Ratio
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Balance Ratio

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.

Enumeration.Name: WhiteBalanceFunctionMode

Integer.Name: PixelCorrectionIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index for Pixel Correction Data
Integer.Description: Index for Pixel Correction Data

Integer.Name: PixelCorrectionPosX
Integer.ToolTip: Pixel Correction for position X.
Integer.Description: Pixel Correction for position X.
Integer.DisplayName: Pixel Correction Pos X[Pixel Correction Index]

Integer.Name: PixelCorrectionPosY
Integer.ToolTip: Pixel Correction for position Y.
Integer.Description: Pixel Correction for position Y.
Integer.DisplayName: Pixel Correction Pos Y[Pixel Correction Index]

Enumeration.Name: ShadingCorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Shading Correction Mode. Auto:Correct with factory setting value Manual:Correct with ShadingGainManual and ShadingCenterPosX/YManual value
Enumeration.Description: Shading Correction Mode. Auto:Correct with factory setting value Manual:Correct with ShadingGainManual and ShadingCenterPosX/YManual value

Enumeration.Name: ShadingGainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Shading Gain Manual
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Shading Gain Manual

Integer.Name: ShadingGainManual
Integer.ToolTip: Set the Shading Gain[Shading Gain Selector]
Integer.Description: Set the Shading Gain[Shading Gain Selector]

Integer.Name: ShadingCenterPosXManual
Integer.ToolTip: Set the X position of the center of shading. This position is when ReverseX = false and Width = Sensor Width.
Integer.Description: Set the X position of the center of shading. This position is when ReverseX = false and Width = Sensor Width.

Integer.Name: ShadingCenterPosYManual
Integer.ToolTip: Set the Y position of the center of shading. This position is when ReverseY = false and Height = Sensor Height.
Integer.Description: Set the Y position of the center of shading. This position is when ReverseY = false and Height = Sensor Height.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for Line
Enumeration.Description: Selector for Line

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector for User Output
Enumeration.Description: Selector for User Output

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Float.Name: LineDebounceTime
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after receiving a IO signal and before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after receiving a IO signal and before activating it.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each data buffer or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each data buffer or chunk on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: Gives the Stream ID of the nth image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: Gives the Stream ID of the nth image stream from the Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred
Enumeration.ToolTip: Provides the value of the ConnectionConfig register that allows the Device to operate in its default mode.
Enumeration.Description: Provides the value of the ConnectionConfig register that allows the Device to operate in its default mode.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the current and active Link configuration used by the Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the current and active Link configuration used by the Device.

Enumeration.Name: TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the test mode of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the test mode of the Device.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCountSelector
Integer.ToolTip: This feature holds a valid device connection ID of the test mode.
Integer.Description: This feature holds a valid device connection ID of the test mode.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the error count for test packets received by the device on the connection selected by Test Error Count Selector.
Integer.Description: Reports the error count for test packets received by the device on the connection selected by Test Error Count Selector.
Integer.DisplayName: Test Error Count[Test Error Count Selector]

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

Integer.Name: AdjustModelData
Integer.ToolTip: Model data for factory default
Integer.Description: Model data for factory default

Integer.Name: RegAddr
Integer.ToolTip: regAddr
Integer.Description: regAddr

Integer.Name: RegReadData
Integer.ToolTip: regReadData
Integer.Description: regReadData

Integer.Name: RegWriteData
Integer.ToolTip: regWriteData
Integer.Description: regWriteData

Enumeration.Name: RegTargetSelect
Enumeration.ToolTip: RegTargetSelect
Enumeration.Description: RegTargetSelect

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.
Port.Description: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.
